CSPViolationReportBodyOriginalPolicy.summary: The originalPolicy read-only property of the interface is a string that represents the Content Security Policy (CSP) whose enforcement uncovered the violation.

remarks.para:
This is the string in the Content-Security-Policy HTTP response header that contains the list of directives and their values that make the CSP policy.
Note that differs from the , which is the specific directive that is effectively being violated (and which might not be explicitly listed in the policy if default-src is used).

CSPViolationReportBodyOriginalPolicy.value: A string representing the policy whose enforcement uncovered the violation.
